title: Huawei Nexus leak renews hope for Google’s next smartphone | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Huaweilogo]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * Huawei was previously tipped to use its own custom-built Kirin chip [in thenew Nexus](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/huawei-kirin-950-chip-leaks-destined-for-future-flagships), but this report claims it will actuallyfeature Qualcomm’s flagship [Snapdragon810](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/snapdragon-810-features).The report suggests that Google pushed Huawei to use a Qualcomm chipset due tothe fact that the Kirin series haven’t had time to prove themselves onflagship smartphones.Unfortunately, neither Google nor Huawei have officially confirmed the nextNexus entry’s existence.There’s mounting pressure on Google to get the next iteration right, however,as last year’s Nexus 6 received a surprisingly lukewarm critical reception.
